name: devopness-sdk-js
description: Devopness API JS/TS SDK - Painless essential DevOps to everyone

scripts.build-api-models: openapi-generator generate --template-dir ./src/api/generator/templates --skip-validate-spec --minimal-update -i http://127.0.0.1:9090/spec.json -g typescript-axios -o ./src/api -p withSeparateModelsAndApi=true --api-package _auto_generated_apis_ignore --model-package models --additional-properties supportsES6=false && npm run replace-tslint-disable-directive-with-eslint && npm run build
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm version patch

author: Devopness (https://www.devopness.com)
